channel.title: Tutorial help >.<
channel.description:
Hey, so far I've been able to get everything I want to work working, but I still have a few things I can't edit. I'm using TestScape just so you know.
1. I don't know how to make shops, and the only tutorial I've found (by sk8er) didn't work for me, after like 5 trys, sad I know lol :(
2. Whenever I put an NPC in auto-spawn and put in THE RIGHT CO-ORDS, they don't show up.
3. Whenever I place a NPC and log, the NPC disappears.
4. Although the NPC list says certain monsters have HP (Kalphite Queen for example), when I attack them, they die without me doing any damage.
Thanks for taking time to read this.
